en.title: Christmas For Payatas on "One Morning" TV Program, Philippines!
en.content:
"Christmas For Payatas" was interviewed live on the popular TV program "One Morning" which is broadcast simultaneously on 4 major channels locally and also to 45 major cities abroad through cable via The Filipino Channel (TFC). "Christmas for Payatas" will gain a lot of exposure through this broadcast.

Two of FE's endorsers, Samboy Lim and Alvin Patrimonio, took time out of their busy schedules to be there to make an appeal to the community. Judge Lorenzo Veneracion represented the Lighthouse Foundation for Children and Jeremy Looi, FE's Philippines Country Licensee represented FE who is a major donor and sponsor of "Christmas For Payatas".

meta.description: "Christmas For Payatas" was interviewed live on the popular TV program "One Morning" simultaneously via The Filipino Channel (TFC).
meta.keyword: Christmas For Payatas, "One Morning", The Filipino Channel (TFC), Samboy Lim, Alvin Patrimonio, Judge Lorenzo Veneracion, Jeremy Looi
meta.author: klhunter
